refnamediv.refpurpose: Create a menu or a submenu in a figure

listitem.para: Handle of the parent of the menu.
Name of a property to set up.
All available properties are listed on the uimenu properties help page.
Value to affect to the corresponding property.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This function allows to create menus in a figure. If parent is a figure, then the menu item will be added to the menu bar of the figure. If parent is a menu item , then the new item will be added to the parent item, allowing to create cascaded menus.

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.para: Menus or menuitem can have a LaTeX or a MathML label
